user_instruction: 'Update Susan on the team'"'"'s latest developments via email (susan@apexmarketing.com). You can check out my Slack and Notion for information.'

    {

    {
      "ts": "1751127404.925279",
      "text": "Morning John, I've uploaded the revised graphics for the campaign to the shared drive.",

    },
    {
      "ts": "1751127403.367219",
      "text": "I've been working on the new slogan for the campaign, what do you think of 'Evolving with You - Every Step of the Way'?",

    },
